summary: This module implements utilities for Sparse-Dense-Dense Matrix Multiplication (SDDMM) within the Deep Graph Library. It provides mechanisms to generate and register backend-specific SDDMM kernels, handle data copying between edge and node tensors, and support both homogeneous and heterogeneous graph structures.
business_intent: Enable highâ€‘performance graph neural network computations by offering optimized SDDMM operations that combine edge and node features across different hardware backends.
